description: This file defines a Python class 'AzureOpenAIEmbedder' that integrates with the OpenAI Azure API to generate text embeddings. It manages configuration via environment variables, constructs an OpenAI client, and provides methods to obtain embeddings and their usage data.

classes.name: AzureOpenAIEmbedder
classes.description: A class that encapsulates the logic for creating text embeddings using Azure OpenAI API, with configurable parameters and methods for retrieving embeddings.

methods.name: client
methods.description: Property that initializes and returns an AzureOpenAIClient instance configured with the current parameters.

methods.name: _response
methods.description: Internal method that sends a request to create an embedding for the given text.

methods.name: get_embedding
methods.description: Public method that returns the embedding vector for the provided text.

methods.name: get_embedding_and_usage
methods.description: Public method that returns the embedding vector along with usage information.
